metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26571 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The gemsafe GPK smart card software driver in OpenSC before 0.21.0-rc1 has a stack-based buffer overflow in sc_pkcs15emu_gemsafeGPK_init.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26571` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.17.0-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.17.0-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: opensc package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.0-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
